mapper.select: SELECT ci.CORP_NO, ci.CORP_REG_NO, ci.CORP_TYPE, ci.CORP_NAME, ci.CORP_LOGO, ci.CORP_CEO_NAME, ci.CORP_ADDR, TO_CHAR(ci.CORP_OPEN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS corp_open_date, ci.CORP_HOME_LINK, ci.CORP_BM, ci.CORP_DETAIL, ci.CORP_BENEFIT, ci.CORP_BENEFIT_DETAIL, ci.CORP_BAN_FL, ci.CORP_BAN_DATE, cm.MEM_NO, cm.CORP_MEM_ROLE_CHECK FROM CORP_INFO ci JOIN CORP_MEM cm ON ci.CORP_NO = cm.CORP_NO WHERE cm.MEM_NO = #{memNo}
SELECT CI.CORP_NO, CI.CORP_NAME, CI.CORP_LOGO, CI.CORP_TYPE, CI.CORP_BENEFIT, CI.CORP_BENEFIT_DETAIL FROM CORP_INFO CI JOIN CORP_MEM CM ON CI.CORP_NO = CM.CORP_NO WHERE CM.MEM_NO = #{memNo}
SELECT CI.*, CM.MEM_NO, CM.CORP_MEM_ROLE_CHECK FROM CORP_INFO CI JOIN CORP_MEM CM ON CI.CORP_NO = CM.CORP_NO WHERE CM.MEM_NO = #{memNo}
